citations.narrative:
There are accumulations of excreta below the wire floors of all the rabbit enclosures. In addition, the rabbit enclosures
have hair accumulating on wire surfaces and two enclosures have a fecal compact on top of the wire flooring preventing
the excreta to fall through the wire openings. Licensee stated the rabbit enclosures were last cleaned about two weeks
ago. Failure to keep the enclosures reasonably free of excreta and hair can affect the health of the rabbits. Licensee must
ensure that rabbit enclosures are kept clean to prevent accumulations of excreta, hair, and debris. The drainboards under
the wire flooring must also be cleaned at least once each week. Correct by April 3, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.56(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
There are accumulations of excreta below the wire floors of all the rabbit enclosures. In addition, the rabbit enclosures 
have hair accumulating on wire surfaces and two enclosures have a fecal compact on top of the wire flooring preventing 
the excreta to fall through the wire openings. Licensee stated the rabbit enclosures were last cleaned about two weeks 
ago. Failure to keep the enclosures reasonably free of excreta and hair can affect the health of the rabbits. Licensee must 
ensure that rabbit enclosures are kept clean to prevent accumulations of excreta, hair, and debris. The drainboards under 
the wire flooring must also be cleaned at least once each week. Correct by April 3, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
